subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Without Pedro Martínez, the Mets’ rotation is nowhere near what it had been earlier in the season.  Yet, the Mets are only one win away from advancing to the World Series.
snippet: Without Pedro Martínez, the Mets’ rotation is nowhere near what it had been earlier in the season.  Yet, the Mets are only one win away from advancing to the World Series.
